title: Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1) | Math, Words, Magnetic Blocks, Puzzles | 4-10 Years STEM Toys | Gift Boys & Girls (Works with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, Kindle Fire)
descriptions:
Introducing the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link! This 3-in-1 AR-powered STEM kit is designed to make learning math, spelling, vocabulary, and puzzle-solving an interactive and engaging experience for children aged 4 to 10 years.

With the Plugo Count kit, children can develop their counting and arithmetic skills while having fun with magnetic blocks. The Plugo Letters kit focuses on linguistic abilities, helping children improve their spelling, vocabulary, and comprehension. Lastly, the Plugo Link kit enhances problem-solving skills through engaging puzzles.

The Plugo STEM Pack includes three kits (Count, Letters, and Link) as well as a foldable mat with a device slot and embedded magnets, known as the Plugo Gamepad. The interactive games count up to 15, with a total of 750 levels. This adaptive learning system caters to a wide range of educational levels, from pre-K to Grade 4.

The Plugo app is available on both the App Store and Play Store, making it accessible to iOS and Android users. Compatibility with devices is extensive, including iPhone 6 and above, iPad 5th Gen and above (excluding iPad Mini 1 and iPad Pro 12.9"), and select Amazon Fire models (7 - 2022, 8 - 2018 & 2020, 8+ - 2020).

This STEM Pack offers numerous learning outcomes, including counting, arithmetic, linguistic abilities, comprehension, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills. It also promotes a STEM-focused approach, encouraging children to develop their math, engineering, and linguistic abilities.

The package contains three Plugo kits (Count, Letters, and Link), along with the Plugo Gamepad. Please note that the device is not included. The Plugo app is available for free and does not have any in-app purchases.

The Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu is an excellent gift option for both boys and girls. It's a fantastic way to combine education and play, allowing children to learn and have fun simultaneously. Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity to enhance your child's STEM skills!

Introducing the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link! This 3-in-1 AR-powered STEM kit is designed to make learning math, spelling, vocabulary, and puzzle-solving a fun and interactive experience for kids aged 4-10 years.

The Plugo STEM Pack includes three kits: Plugo Count, Plugo Letters, and Plugo Link. Each kit comes with magnetic blocks that bring the learning experience to life. The pack also includes a foldable mat with a device slot and embedded magnets, which acts as a gamepad for enhanced gameplay.

With 15 interactive games and over 750 levels, the Plugo app provides a progressive education experience suitable for pre-K to Grade 4 learners. The app is available for free on both the App Store and Play Store, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of devices.

The Plugo STEM Pack is suitable for both boys and girls and is aimed at developing essential skills such as counting, arithmetic, linguistic abilities, comprehension, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills. It also focuses on fostering a love for STEM subjects, including math and engineering.

The Plugo STEM Pack is compatible with iOS devices such as iPhone 6 and above, as well as iPad 5th Gen and above (excluding iPad Mini 1 and iPad Pro 12.9"). For Android users, the minimum requirements include an OS version of 8, a minimum RAM of 2GB, a front camera positioned at the top center, and a screen size limitation of 10 inches and above (not supported). Amazon Fire users can also enjoy the Plugo STEM Pack on supported models.

In the box, you will find three Plugo kits (Count, Letters, and Link) along with a gamepad. Please note that the device is not included.

Unlock the full potential of your child's learning with the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link. Get yours today and watch as your child develops essential skills while having a blast!

Introducing the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link! This amazing 3-in-1 AR-powered STEM kit is designed to make learning math, spelling, vocabulary, and puzzle-solving a fun and interactive experience for children aged 4 to 10 years.

With magnetic blocks and a foldable mat with a device slot and embedded magnets, this STEM pack includes three Plugo kits - Plugo Count, Plugo Letters, and Plugo Link. These kits are perfect for developing counting, arithmetic, linguistic, comprehension, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills.

The Plugo app offers an inclusive learning experience with 15 interactive games and over 750 levels. The progressive education approach adapts to the child's learning level, making it suitable for pre-K to Grade 4. Plus, there are no in-app purchases, ensuring a hassle-free experience.

The Plugo STEM Pack is compatible with various devices. For iOS users, it supports iPhone 6 and above, as well as iPad 5th Gen and above (except for iPad Mini 1 and iPad Pro 12.9"). Android users can enjoy the Plugo app on devices with an OS version of 8 or above, a minimum of 2GB RAM, and a front camera positioned at the top center. Please note that tablets with a screen size of 10 inches and above are not supported. Amazon Fire tablet users can also join in on the fun with supported models including 7 - 2022, 8 - 2018 & 2020, and 8+ - 2020.

The Plugo STEM Pack is a perfect gift for both boys and girls. It offers a wide range of learning outcomes, including counting, arithmetic, linguistic abilities, comprehension, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills. Additionally, it focuses on STEM skills such as math, engineering, and linguistic abilities.

In the package, you will find three Plugo kits (Count, Letters, and Link) and one Plugo Gamepad. Please note that the device is not included.

The Plugo app is available for download on both the App Store and Play Store, and it comes at no additional cost. So why wait? Get your Plugo STEM Pack today and watch your child's educational journey come to life!

**Description:**

Introducing the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu, a 3-in-1 AR-powered STEM kit for children aged 4-10 years. This pack includes three exciting components - Plugo Count, Plugo Letters, and Plugo Link, along with a foldable gamepad mat. 

With Plugo STEM Pack, your child will embark on a thrilling educational journey focused on math, vocabulary, puzzles, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills. The interactive games included in the Plugo app provide a total of 750 levels, ensuring hours of engaging and adaptive learning experiences. The app is designed to cater to children from pre-K to Grade 4, making it suitable for various skill levels.

Plugo STEM Pack is compatible with multiple devices. For iOS users, it supports devices like iPhone 6 and above, as well as iPad 5th Gen and above, excluding iPad Mini 1 and iPad Pro 12.9". Android users with devices running OS version 8 or above and a minimum of 2GB RAM can also enjoy the Plugo app. However, please note that devices with a screen size of 10 inches and above are not supported. Amazon Fire tablets, including models 7 - 2022, 8 - 2018 & 2020, and 8+ - 2020, are also compatible with the Plugo STEM Pack.

The Plugo app is available for download on both App Store and Play Store, ensuring easy access for all users. Best of all, the app is free to download and does not include any in-app purchases. 

The Plugo STEM Pack is a perfect gift for boys and girls alike. It offers a wide range of learning outcomes, including counting, arithmetic, linguistic skills, comprehension, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills. Additionally, it fosters an interest in STEM subjects such as math and engineering, as well as enhancing linguistic abilities.

Unleash your child's potential with the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - an educational toy that combines learning and fun!
